question: Match the following: <image 1>
description:
The image contains a list of four entities on the left side and four descriptions on the right side. The entities are:

1. Retailer
2. Manufacturer
3. Distributor
4. Agent

The descriptions are:

I. Low margin, high volume
II. Does not take title to goods
III. The direct link with the customer
IV. Gives products to distributes

The task is to match each entity with the appropriate description.
